properties.name: Lia's Apartment
properties.checkin_instructions: You will receive a code for the front door on the day of your arrival. Please contact me when you arrive so I can answer any questions about the property.
properties.checkout_instructions: If you'd like to request a late check-out, please contact me. However, please be informed that we may not be able to grant your request if we have a same-day check-in.
properties.welcome_title: Hello and welcome to my home!!
properties.welcome_message:
My name is Lia and I'm beyond excited to have you! In this digital welcome book, you'll find lots of useful information. From wifi details to recommendations for nearby restaurants and shopping areas, I’ve got it all covered. I hope you enjoy your stay while you're here. If there is anything that I can do to make your stay even better, please feel free to reach out to me.

Have a great stay!!
Sincerely, Lia
properties.amenities_description:
The apartment features one room and is equipped with all the amenities you need for a comfortable stay.

  • Wifi
  • Smart TV
  • Coffee machine
  • Hairdryer
  • Linens
  • Tableware
  • Air conditioning
  • Washer & dryer
  • Shampoo & body wash
  • Extra towels & blankets

Don’t see something you need?
Please contact us and if it’s something we have, we’ll let you know.
properties.location_description: Apartment Lia is ready to accommodate you and your company or your family. A comfortable and beautiful apartment on the ground floor of 85 m². and is located 2 km from the city of Corfu, in the picturesque village of Potamos. We are waiting to welcome you.

owners.name: Lia Armeni
owners.message: Please do not hesitate to contact me with any questions during your stay.

rules.title: NO SMOKING
rules.description: Please no smoking or vaping around the house.

rules.title: NO GUESTS
rules.description: No unregistered guests. Please notify the host if you'd like to add any additional guests to your rental agreement.

rules.title: NO PETS
rules.description: Please no pets on the property at any time.

rules.title: NO PARTIES
rules.description: No parties or events are allowed. Drug use and excessive drinking are prohibited.

rules.title: DAMAGES
rules.description: Please report any damage or malfunction to the host right away so we can repair or replace the damaged item.
